# BUILDTIME REQUIREMENTS

* [Go](https://golang.org/) 1.13+
* a POSIX compatible shell (e.g., `bash`, `ksh`, `sh`, `zsh`)
* Go development tools (`sh acquire`)
* [Docker](https://www.docker.com/) 19+

# INSTALL FROM SOURCE

```console
$ mage install
```

# UNINSTALL

```console
$ mage uninstall
```

# TEST

```console
$ mage test
```

# LINT

```console
$ mage lint
```

# PORT

```console
$ mage port
```
